title: Let's Watch TV: Love After Lockup
description:
This week, things get a little dicey as Joe and Fran watch the We TV show Love After Lock Up to explore the incredibly strange relationships of recently released inmates and the people who fall in love with them while in prison.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
